drupalNodeEvent.title: Assembling the New China: Labor Brokerage

field_speakers.processed: Julia Chuang (Boston College), Xinrong Ma (Sun Yat-Sen University)

field_description.processed: The growth of the Greater Bay Area in South China is still heavily reliant on the access to cheap labor. This seminar examines the role of labor brokers in shaping rural-urban labor migration in China.
